Title: Jaguars to decline Tyler Eifert's 2021 option, veteran tight end will enter free agency, per report
Description: Tyler Eifert's tenure with the Jacksonville Jaguars looks like will come to a close after just one season. According to Ian Rapoport of the NFL Network, the Jaguars are expected to decline the veteran tight end's team option for 2021,
Author: CBSSports.com
